description: A Flutter widget named TvFocusableCard that provides a reusable, focusable, and scalable card component for TV or 10-foot UI apps. It handles focus changes, scaling animations, and activation (select/enter) actions, with customizable appearance and behavior.

classes.name: TvFocusableCard
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing a focusable, scalable card for TV UI, customizable with child widget, onPressed callback, focus behavior, and visual styles.

classes.name: _TvFocusableCardState
classes.description: The private state class managing focus animations, activation handling, and building the focus-aware, animated card widget.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the TvFocusableCard widget.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the focus animation controller and scaling animation.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the animation controller when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _onFocusChanged
methods.description: Callback triggered when focus state changes, updates animation accordingly.

methods.name: _handleActivate
methods.description: Invokes the onPressed callback when the widget is activated (e.g., Enter key).

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including focus detection, scale animation, and material card with hit target.
